titleStmt.title: Here beginneth a song of the Lordes Supper
titleStmt.author: Tilney, Edmund, d. 1610, attributed author.
Tilney, Emery, d. 1606, attributed author.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Wylliam Copland. and are to be solde by Robert Stoughton dwelling wythin Ludgat ..,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Finis quot. E.T.
Attributed to Emery Tilney, and Edmund Tilney.
Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Upper and lower margins trimmed, affecting some text and signatures.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
